A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: ok i understand the need to please all age groups and be light hearted (call me grumpy!) but there was far too much comedy and one liners in this movie\, even Yoda has developed a sense of humour! Yes the action scenes were very good but after the hype fades away people will see it being much the same as force awakens. The pace of the movie is confusing.....Rey is a Jedi maters in matter of days . For me Rogue One proved what could be done with a star wars movie more closely aligned to the originals. And why have we been left with one terrible evil villain Kylo Ren.......
